org.sql: SELECT DISTINCT follows.id AS alias_0, accounts.id FROM accounts LEFT OUTER JOIN follows ON follows.target_account_id = accounts.id LEFT OUTER JOIN account_stats ON account_stats.account_id = accounts.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND follows.account_id = "$1" ORDER BY follows.id DESC LIMIT "$2"
